subsection_title: Hospital and Institutional Consultations and Assessments

fee_codes.description: Admission assessment by the MRP, to admission assessment
fee_codes.conditions: Eligible for payment once per patient per hospital admission.

fee_codes.description: Subsequent visit by the MRP - day following the hospital admission assessment
fee_codes.conditions: Limited to a maximum of one each per hospital admission.

fee_codes.description: Subsequent visit by the MRP - second day following the hospital admission assessment
fee_codes.conditions: Limited to a maximum of one each per hospital admission.

fee_codes.description: Subsequent visit by the MRP - day of discharge
fee_codes.conditions: Limited to one service per hospital admission.

fee_codes.description: First subsequent visit by the MRP following transfer from an Intensive Care Area
fee_codes.conditions: Limited to a maximum of one each per hospital admission.

fee_codes.description: Second subsequent visit by the MRP following transfer from an Intensive Care Area
fee_codes.conditions: Limited to a maximum of one each per hospital admission.

fee_codes.description: Subsequent visit by the MRP, to subsequent visits and C122, C123, C124, C142, C143, C882 or C982
fee_codes.conditions: Add 30%. Only one of E083 or E084 is eligible for payment per patient per day.

fee_codes.description: Saturday, Sunday or Holiday subsequent visit by the MRP, to subsequent visits and C122, C123, C124, C142, C143, C882 or C982
fee_codes.conditions: Add 45%. Only one of E083 or E084 is eligible for payment per patient per day.

referenced_codes.description: Not eligible for payment for an admission assessment for an elective surgery patient when a pre-operative assessment has been rendered to the same patient within 30 days of admission by the same physician.
referenced_codes.source_subsection: Hospital and Institutional Consultations and Assessments

referenced_codes.context: additional visit due to intercurrent illness
referenced_codes.description: Any assessment in hospital required as a result of an acute intercurrent illness in excess of the weekly or monthly limits.
referenced_codes.source_subsection: Hospital and Institutional Consultations and Assessments

referenced_codes.description: Limited to one per patient, per day for the duration of the admission.
referenced_codes.source_subsection: Hospital and Institutional Consultations and Assessments
